statements: UPDATE sustainability_practices SET brand_name = 'ABC Inc.', product_name = 'Product A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET ethical_sourcing = TRUE, material_used = 'Recycled Plastic' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET production_method = 'Recycled', material_used = 'Organic Cotton' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET brand_name = 'EcoFashion', ethical_sourcing = TRUE WHERE product_name = 'Green Tee';
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET sustainability_rating = 4, ethical_rating = 3 WHERE brand_name = 'Nike'
UPDATE sourcing_methods SET certifications = 'Fair Trade Certified', material_type = 'Organic Cotton' WHERE brand_name = 'Adidas'
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET production_method='Recycled materials', sustainability_rating=9 WHERE brand_name='Brand A' AND product_name='Product X';
UPDATE sourcing_methods SET certifications='Organic, Fair Trade' WHERE brand_name='Brand B' AND source_location='Europe';
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET eco_friendly = TRUE, fair_trade = FALSE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ethical_sourcing SET supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers', certification = 'Organic' WHERE brand_name = 'Brand XYZ';
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET eco_friendly = TRUE, fair_trade = TRUE WHERE brand_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE ethical_sourcing SET certification = 'Fair Trade Certified', supplier_name = 'Global Suppliers Ltd' WHERE brand_name = 'XYZ Inc';
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET sustainability_rating = 4, certification_status = true WHERE company_name = 'GreenCo';
UPDATE production_methods SET labor_conditions_rating = 5 WHERE method_name = 'Fair Trade';
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET sustainability_rating = 5, certification_status = TRUE WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc'
UPDATE ethical_sourcing SET ethical_rating = 4, supplier_name = 'Supplier XYZ' WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
UPDATE Sustainability_Practices SET sustainability_rating = 5 WHERE brand_name = 'GreenCo';
UPDATE Ethical_Sourcing SET certification = 'Fair Trade', product_type = 'Apparel' WHERE manufacturer_name = 'EcoFabrics' AND country_of_origin = 'USA';
UPDATE Sustainability_Practices SET sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE brand_name = 'EcoFashion'
UPDATE Fashion_Items SET color = 'Blue', price = 49.99 WHERE size = 'M'
